title: All-optical anatomical co-registration for molecular imaging of small animals using dynamic contrast
title_cn: 使用动态对比对小动物进行分子成像的全光学解剖共配准
abstract: Optical molecular imaging in small animals harnesses the power of highly specific and biocompatible contrast agents for drug development and disease research. However, the widespread adoption of in vivo optical imaging has been inhibited by its inability to clearly resolve and identify targeted internal organs. Optical tomography and combined X-ray and micro-computed tomography (micro-CT) approaches developed to address this problem are generally expensive, complex or incapable of true anatomical co-registration. Here, we present a remarkably simple all-optical method that can generate co-registered anatomical maps of a mouse's internal organs, while also acquiring in vivo molecular imaging data. The technique uses a time series of images acquired after injection of an inert dye. Differences in the dye's in vivo biodistribution dynamics allow precise delineation and identification of major organs. Such co-registered anatomical maps permit longitudinal organ identification irrespective of repositioning or weight gain, thereby promising greatly improved accuracy and versatility for studies of orthotopic disease, diagnostics and therapies.
abstract_cn: 小动物的光学分子成像利用了高度特异性和生物相容性造影剂的力量来进行药物开发和疾病研究。然而，体内光学成像的广泛采用由于无法清晰地分辨和识别目标内脏而受到抑制。为解决这个问题而开发的光学断层摄影以及X射线和微型计算机断层摄影（micro-CT）组合方法通常很昂贵，复杂或无法进行真正的解剖共配准。在这里，我们提出了一种非常简单的全光学方法，该方法可以生成鼠标内部器官的共同配准的解剖图，同时还可以获取体内分子成像数据。该技术使用在注入惰性染料后获取的图像时间序列。染料在体内的生物分布动力学差异可精确描绘和鉴定主要器官。这种共同注册的解剖图可以进行纵向器官识别，而无需考虑重新定位或体重增加，从而有望大大提高用于原位疾病，诊断和疗法研究的准确性和多功能性。

title: Sensitive solution-processed visible-wavelength photodetectors
title_cn: 敏感溶液处理的可见光光电探测器
abstract: One billion image sensors worldwide render optical images as digital photographs in video cameras, still cameras and camera phones. These silicon-based sensors monolithically integrate photodetection with electronic readout. However, silicon photodiodes rely on a smaller bandgap than that required for visible detection; this degrades visible-wavelength sensitivity and produces unwanted infrared sensitivity. Thin-film top-surface visible photodetectors have therefore been investigated based on amorphous, organic and colloidal quantum-dot semiconductors. However, none of these devices has exhibited visible sensitivity approaching that of silicon. Here we report a sensitive solution-processed photodetector that, across the entire visible spectrum, exhibits D* (normalized detectivity) greater than 5 × 1012 Jones (a unit of detectivity equivalent to cm Hz1/2 W−1). A photoconductive gain of >100 has been measured, facilitating high-fidelity electronic readout, and the linear dynamic range is greater than 60 dB, as required for high-contrast applications. These photodetectors are also compatible with flexible organic-based electronics.
abstract_cn: 全世界有十亿个图像传感器在摄像机，照相机和照相手机中将光学图像作为数码照片进行渲染。这些基于硅的传感器将光电检测与电子读数单片集成。但是，硅光电二极管所需要​​的带隙比可见光检测所需要的要小。这会降低可见光的灵敏度，并产生有害的红外灵敏度。因此，已经研究了基于非晶，有机和胶体量子点半导体的薄膜顶表面可见光探测器。但是，这些器件均未显示出接近硅的可见灵敏度。在这里，我们报告了一种敏感的溶液处理的光电探测器，该探测器在整个可见光谱中的D *（归一化检测率）均大于5＆＃160;＆＃215;＆＃160; 10 12 Jones（a探测单位等于cm＆＃160; Hz 1/2 ＆＃160; W ＆＃8722; 1 ）。已经测量了大于100的光电导增益，以促进高保真度的电子读出，并且线性动态范围大于60 dB，这是高对比度应用所需的。这些光电探测器还与基于柔性有机物的电子产品兼容。

title: All-dielectric photonic-assisted radio front-end technology
title_cn: 全电介质光子辅助无线电前端技术
abstract: The threats to civil society posed by high-power electromagnetic weapons are viewed as a grim but real possibility in the world after 11 September 2001 (refs ). These weapons produce a power surge capable of destroying or damaging sensitive circuitry in electronic systems. Unfortunately, the trend towards circuits with smaller sizes and voltages renders modern electronics highly susceptible to such damage. Radiofrequency communication systems are particularly vulnerable, because the antenna provides a direct port of entry for electromagnetic radiation. Here, we report a type of radiofrequency receiver front end featuring a complete absence of electronic circuitry and metal interconnects, the traditional ‘soft spots’ of a conventional radiofrequency receiver. The device exploits a dielectric resonator antenna to capture and deliver the radiofrequency signal onto an electro–optic field sensor. The dielectric approach has an added benefit in that it reduces the physical size of the front end, an important benefit in mobile applications.
abstract_cn: 2001年9月11日以后，世界上大功率电磁武器对民间社会的威胁被认为是严峻而现实的可能性（参考文献＃160;）。这些武器产生电涌，能够破坏或损坏电子系统中的敏感电路。不幸的是，趋向于具有较小尺寸和电压的电路的趋势使得现代电子产品极易受到这种损坏的影响。射频通信系统特别容易受到攻击，因为天线为电磁辐射提供了直接的进入端口。在这里，我们报告了一种射频接收器前端，其特征是完全没有电子电路和金属互连，即传统的“软点”。常规射频接收机的示意图。该设备利用介电共振器天线来捕获射频信号并将其传递到电光传感器上。介电方法的另一个好处是，它减小了前端的物理尺寸，这在移动应用程序中是一个重要的好处。

title: Attosecond nanoplasmonic-field microscope
title_cn: 阿秒纳米等离子体场显微镜
abstract: Nanoplasmonics deals with collective electronic dynamics on the surface of metal nanostructures, which arises as a result of excitations called surface plasmons. This field, which has recently undergone rapid growth, could benefit applications such as computing and information storage on the nanoscale, the ultrasensitive detection and spectroscopy of physical, chemical and biological nanosized objects, and the development of optoelectronic devices. Because of their broad spectral bandwidth, surface plasmons undergo ultrafast dynamics with timescales as short as a few hundred attoseconds. So far, the spatiotemporal dynamics of optical fields localized on the nanoscale has been hidden from direct access in the real space and time domain. Here, we propose an approach that will, for the first time, provide direct, non-invasive access to the nanoplasmonic collective dynamics, with nanometre-scale spatial resolution and temporal resolution on the order of 100 attoseconds. The method, which combines photoelectron emission microscopy and attosecond streaking spectroscopy, offers a valuable way of probing nanolocalized optical fields that will be interesting both from a fundamental point of view and in light of the existing and potential applications of nanoplasmonics.
abstract_cn: 纳米质子学处理金属纳米结构表面上的集体电子动力学，这是由于称为表面等离激元的激发而产生的。这个领域，最近经历了快速的发展，可以使应用受益，例如纳米级的计算和信息存储，物理，化学和生物纳米尺寸物体的超灵敏检测和光谱学以及光电器件的发展。由于表面等离子体激元具有宽频谱带宽，因此它们的超短时间动态范围只有几百个阿秒。到目前为止，位于纳米级的光场的时空动力学已经被隐藏在真实的时空域中。在这里，我们提出了一种方法，这将首次提供对纳米等离子集体动力学的直接，非侵入性访问，纳米级的空间分辨率和时间分辨率约为100阿秒。该方法结合了光电子发射显微镜和阿秒条纹光谱技术，为探测纳米局部光场提供了一种有价值的方法，从基本的角度以及鉴于纳米等离子体的现有和潜在应用，这将是有趣的。
